text: Manitarkale! Unkal anaivaraiyum niccayamaka nam ore'or an, ore'or penniliruntutan pataittom. Pinnar, oruvar marravarai arintukollum poruttu, unkalaik kilaikalakavum kottirankalakavum akkinom. (Atalal, unkalil oruvar marravaraivita melanavar enru perumai pecatirkal.) Eninum, unkalil evar iraiyaccam utaiyavaraka irukkiraro, avartan allahvitattil niccayamaka mika kanniyamanavar. Niccayamaka allah (anaittaiyum) nankarintavan, nanku terintavan avan
